results.name: Number of ones in the binary expansion of n!.
link: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Florian Luca, The number of non-zero digits of n!, Canad. Math. Bull. 45 (2002), pp. 115-118.
Carlo Sanna, On the sum of digits of the factorial, arXiv:1409.4912 [math.NT], 2014.
Carlo Sanna, On the sum of digits of the factorial, Journal of Number Theory 147 (2015), pp. 836-841.
formula: a(n) << n log n. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Mar 27 2013
xref: Cf. A000120 (binary weight), A000142 (factorial), A004152 (sum of decimal digits).
results.author: Jose R. Brox (tautocrona(AT)terra.es), Jan 26 2003
